description: This file defines a React functional component 'HelloWorld' used in a Remotion video project. It imports several Remotion modules, as well as custom components (Logo, Subtitle, Title), and schema validation via zod for its props. The component orchestrates animations using spring and interpolate functions, rendering animated elements in a video sequence.

methods.name: HelloWorld
methods.description: React functional component that renders animated video content based on props, using spring and interpolate animations.
